system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Combat Swords)}

Benefits

When wielding a shortsword, bastard sword, broadsword, longsword, great sword, khepesh, or maquahuitl the size class can be considered to be one less.

Special

When calculating the POW damage bonus, use the original size of the weapon. Medium sized weapons can be used one handed.
system.summary: Combat Swords can be used as 1 size less.
